mapper.select: select A.*, b.gender, b.nickname, to_char(meetdate, 'yyyy/MM/dd') as meetday, to_number(extract(year from sysdate))-(to_number(substr(b.birth,0,2))+1900)+1 as age from meet A left join rp_user B on A.userid=b.userid

select A.*, b.gender, b.nickname, to_char(meetdate, 'yyyy/MM/dd') as meetday, to_number(extract(year from sysdate))-(to_number(substr(b.birth,0,2))+1900)+1 as age from meet A left join rp_user B on A.userid=b.userid where A.meetdate between #{start} and #{end} and A.address like '%'||#{area}||'%'
mapper.insert:
insert into meet(meetno, userid, area, title, content, meetdate, meettime, address, hitscount, replycount, writedate) values(seq_meet.nextval, #{userId}, #{area}, #{title}, #{content}, #{meetDate}, #{meetTime}, #{address}, default, default, sysdate)
select seq_meet.currval from dual
mapper.select: select * from meet A left join rp_user B on A.userid=b.userid where meetno=#{meetNo}
mapper.update: update meet set userid=#{userId}, area=#{area}, title=#{title}, content=#{content}, meetdate=#{meetDate}, meettime=#{meetTime}, address=#{address} where meetno=#{meetNo}
